column4: using dapper, i am trying to uninstall xmms, it locks up on me.  I can see it in my menu, when i go to synaptic or add/remove, it does not show it installed.  yet it is in my sound & vid menu.  how can i remove it
>> in a term "sudo apt-get remove xmms"
>> if you continue to have issues with xmms, you may want to try beep-media-player instead
